msu-desc: Enables easy uploads for one file or multiple files simultaneously
msu-ext-not-allowed: Only the following file {{PLURAL:$1|type is|types are}} allowed:
msu-messagetitle-file-too-large: File exceed the maximum allowable size.
msu-upload-error-file-too-large: Warning, the file you are trying to upload exceed  the maximum allowable size ( $1 Mo ).
msu-upload-nbfile-exceed: File limit per step exceeded, please remove an image before add another.
mmsupload-conflicting-imgs-modal-filenam: Filename already taken! Try another one.
mmsupload-conflicting-imgs-modal-field-m: This field must not be empty.
